help.entry:
SHOW
Usage: show <mode> [argument]
Valid Modes:
death errors godrooms houses player rent shops stats zones
The SHOW command displays information. Some modes of show require additional information, such as a player name.
death: Shows all death traps in the game. errors: Shows errant rooms. godrooms: Shows the rooms in the 'god zone'. houses: Shows the houses that are currently defined. player: Shows player summary information, simply provide a player name. rent: Shows the filename and path to a players rent file. shops: Shows all the shops in the game and their buy/sell parameters. stats: Shows game status information including players in game, mobs etc. zones: Shows all the zones in the game and their current reset status. An age of -1 means it is in the 'to be reset next' queue.
See also: STAT, ZRESET
